name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Darnell DAVIS, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Darnell DAVIS, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of August, 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED; the Order of the Superior Court is hereby REVERSED; and the case is REMANDED for reinstatement of Petitioners entitlement to pursue a direct appeal. Commonwealth v. Halley, 870 A.2d 795 (Pa.2005).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
882 A.2d 1001
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Darnell DAVIS, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 25, 2005.
